explanation: [0-0] On a city street at night, a truck is parked on the left side of the road. A person wearing a black hoodie is standing next to the truck. Russian subtitles appear above, along with a laughing-crying emoji. On the right side, there is a part of a building with a flight of stairs and an accessible ramp. Several cars are also parked on the road.

[0-5] First, the person in the black hoodie raises their right hand and waves. Then, they get into the driver's seat of the truck and close the door. From the right side, a person wearing black clothes runs out, holding a small bicycle in their hands. They put the bicycle into the back of the truck and run to the other side. Another person dressed in black chases after them from the right side towards the truck. In the middle left, a rotating sign appears with blue, orange, and yellow colors, displaying text in Russian.
